entries.journal_entry_description: Every journey begins with its first step.  This is yours.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go to (3494, -4940) in Mos Eisley on Tatooine and find the bank terminal.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: To deposit and withdraw credits at the bank, use the tilde (`) key on the bank terminal and choose 'Use Bank' then 'Deposit/Withdraw.'  Next, use the slider bar to specify how many credits to have on hand.  The number of credits in the bank is displayed in the box on the right.  The box on the left contains the number of credits on hand.
entries.task02_message_box_text: To deposit and withdraw credits at the bank, use the tilde (`) key on the bank terminal and choose 'Use Bank' then 'Deposit/Withdraw.'  Next, use the slider bar to specify how many credits to have on hand.  The number of credits in the bank is displayed in the box on the right.  The box on the left contains the number of credits on hand.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You can use a bank's safety deposit box to store items.  Use the tilde (') key on the bank terminal and choose 'Use Bank' and then 'Safety Deposit' from the menu to open the bank's storage area.  Access your inventory (I) then left-click and drag the item to be stored into the Safety Deposit window.  Items that you have in your safety deposit box can be retrieved from any bank, no matter what planet you are currently exploring.
entries.task03_message_box_text: You can use a bank's safety deposit box to store items.  Use the tilde (') key on the bank terminal and choose 'Use Bank' and then 'Safety Deposit' from the menu to open the bank's storage area.  Access your inventory (I) then left-click and drag the item to be stored into the Safety Deposit window.  Items that you have in your safety deposit box can be retrieved from any bank, no matter what planet you are currently exploring.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Trehla Keelo for further instruction.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Go to the bazaar terminal at (3511, -4928)  and put the Paint Dispersal Unit that Trehla gave you up for sale.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Left-click on the Bazaar terminal and choose 'Browse Market.' Select 'My Sales' from the tabs across the top of the Bazaar screen.  Press the 'Sell an Item' button at the bottom of the Bazaar screen and left-click on an item to sell from the inventory window that pops up.  Next, set a price in either the 'Instant Sale' or 'Auction' fields.  The 'Instant Sale' option sells the item immediately for exactly the set price.  With 'Auction,' set a minimum bid for an item and a length of time the auction to run.  The item will be returned if it does not sell in the allotted time. Once the price is set, press the 'Sell Item' button in the lower right corner of the window. There is a 20 credit standard fee to sell any item, so keep that in mind when placing an item up for sale.
entries.task07_message_box_text: Left-click on the Bazaar terminal and choose 'Browse Market.' Select 'My Sales' from the tabs across the top of the Bazaar screen.  Press the 'Sell an Item' button at the bottom of the Bazaar screen and left-click on an item to sell from the inventory window that pops up.  Next, set a price in either the 'Instant Sale' or 'Auction' fields.  The 'Instant Sale' option sells the item immediately for exactly the set price.  With 'Auction,' set a minimum bid for an item and a length of time the auction to run.  The item will be returned if it does not sell in the allotted time. Once the price is set, press the 'Sell Item' button in the lower right corner of the window. There is a 20 credit standard fee to sell any item, so keep that in mind when placing an item up for sale.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Left-click on the Bazaar terminal and select 'Browse Market.'  In the Bazaar Window, select 'All Auctions' from the tab at the top of the screen. Choose the location.  'This Region' is recommended at first.  If the full list of available items is too long, or you are looking for a specific item, left-click on a category that interests you, like 'Misc,' then left-click on a sub category, like 'Generic Items.'  Available items appear in the right window along with their prices. Select the item that you want and press the 'Place Bid' button and confirm the purchase by pressing the 'Buy' button in the confirmation window. An e-mail confirmation will then be sent showing where the item may be picked up.
entries.task08_message_box_text: Left-click on the Bazaar terminal and select 'Browse Market.'  In the Bazaar Window, select 'All Auctions' from the tab at the top of the screen. Choose the location.  'This Region' is recommended at first.  If the full list of available items is too long, or you are looking for a specific item, left-click on a category that interests you, like 'Misc,' then left-click on a sub category, like 'Generic Items.'  Available items appear in the right window along with their prices. Select the item that you want and press the 'Place Bid' button and confirm the purchase by pressing the 'Buy' button in the confirmation window. An e-mail confirmation will then be sent showing where the item may be picked up.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Return to Trehla Keelo for further instruction.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Go to Mos Eisley's Cloning Facility at (3424, -5006) on Tatooine.
entries.task10_journal_entry_title: Go to Mos Eisley's Cloning Facility
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: Enter the cloning facility and turn left. The cloning terminals are in the next room. Left-click on the cloning terminal. Choose 'Store Clone Data. Select 'Yes' when asked to confirm. The data will then be stored.
entries.task11_message_box_text: Enter the cloning facility and turn left. The cloning terminals are in the next room. Left-click on the cloning terminal. Choose 'Store Clone Data. Select 'Yes' when asked to confirm. The data will then be stored.
